item.title: Google Taps TotalEnergies For Clean Power To Run Malaysia Data Centers
item.description: TotalEnergies pens 21-year power purchase agreement with Google to supply 1 TWh of renewable electricity from a solar project in Malaysia. read more

item.title: GLJ Research's Gordon Johnson Mocks Tesla Optimus As Chuck E Cheese-Level Tech: 'Will Not Sell One Of These Things In 2026'

item.title: Tesla Rival Xpeng Receives Level 3 Autonomous Testing Permit Amid Planned Robotaxi Push: Report

item.title: Rivian CEO RJ Scaringe Hasn't Ruled Out Robotaxis, Says RIVN Is Focused On Level 4 Autonomy
